summary: In the New World, a new Spanish governor finds the province of Nueva Aragón under the iron fist of the corrupt Colonel Huerta and vows to bring justice under the guise of a masked avenger.
cast: Alain Delon|Stanley Baker|Ottavia Piccolo|Moustache|Adriana Asti|Enzo Cerusico|Giacomo Rossi Stuart|Giampiero Albertini|Marino Masé|Raika Juri|Giovanni Bonadonna|Yvan Chiffre|Domenico Cianfriglia|Fabián Conde|Wladimir Daddi|Arnaldo Dell'Acqua|Tito García|Vincenzo Maggio|José Riesgo|Paulino Rito|Vicente Roca
keywords: character name as title|zorro character|forced kiss|forced wedding|forced marriage
title: El Zorro
